note.p: Of London. Daughter of Thomas Reynolds, a farmer. Married St George Jackson Mivart in 1854.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/87/107/13)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 17 February 2015)
London, England, marriages and banns, 1754–1921 (Ancestry.com, accessed 17 February 2015)
